creator: Cardsys Sdn Bhd
descriptionHtml:
With the PointzMatter Member's App., we give you the convenience of collecting and redeeming points without the presence of a physical card. You can check your points balance, transaction history, and receive the latest promotions.

Download it now! Have fun!
descriptionShort: Be rewarded for purchases from your favorite store.
title: PointzMatter

creator: Cardsys Sdn Bhd
descriptionHtml:
What is PointzMatter?
It is an app that allows users to collect loyalty points from different brands, to receive special rewards and the latest promotion by joining the membership.

What are the benefits?
User-friendly app design and flow allow users to check instant point reward and redemption and do promotion checks in only a few clicks.
More importantly, users can immediately receive any special e-voucher rewards and the latest offers from merchants.
With more brands joining the PointzMatter platform, users can easily join various memberships via the app.

How to join as a merchant?
Contact us (sales@vericardsys.com)
More info: www.vericardsys.com/PointzMatter
descriptionShort: Here's where you get connected to brands & rewards through membership programs

title: PointzMatter

creator: Cardsys Sdn Bhd
descriptionHtml:
What is HAi!CO?
HAi!CO App (formerly known as PointzMatter) offers platform as a service (PaaS) for different brands and memberships. You can now find rewards from all your favourite stores all in one location (anytime, anywhere).

With HAi!CO App, you will never miss a chance to save when you are notified about new promos and we can say goodbye to non-biodegradable plastic cards and printed brochures that just end up in the trash.

HAi!CO provides convenience with innovative solutions for the community that matters the most to our partners. We are passionate about rewarding consumers wherever they are.

Hai! Download HAi!CO App now and enjoy the benefits of convenience and different membership options available in one place.
descriptionShort: HAi!CO App, Rewards Everywhere. Reward & Redeem everywhere with HAi!CO today!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
HAi!CO App, Rewards Everywhere.
(formerly known as PointzMatter)

❗ New Brand.
❗ New Community Platform.
❗ New Interface.
❗ New User Experience.
❗ New Loyalty Program Journey.
❗ New Rewards & Benefits are waiting.
❗ New Rewarding Journey with HAi!CO.
